verses.english: By those [angels] who extract with violence
verses.hausa: Ina rantsuwa da mala'iku mãsu fisgar rãyuka (na kafirai) da ƙarfi.

verses.english: And [by] those who remove with ease
verses.hausa: Da mãsu ɗibar rãyuka (na mũminai) da sauƙi a cikin nishãɗi.

verses.english: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
verses.hausa: Da mãsu sauka daga sama da umurnin Allah kamar suna iyo.

verses.english: And those who race each other in a race
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, su zama mãsu gaugãwa (da umurnin Allah) kamar suna tsẽre.

verses.english: And those who arrange [each] matter,
verses.hausa: Sa, an nan, su kasance masu shirya gudanar da umurni.

verses.english: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
verses.hausa: Rãnar da mai girgiza abũbuwa (bũsar farko) zã ta kaɗa.

verses.english: There will follow it the subsequent [one].
verses.hausa: Mai biyar ta (bũsa ta biyu) nã biye.

verses.english: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
verses.hausa: Wasu zukãta, a rãnar nan, mãsu jin tsõro ne.

verses.english: Their eyes humbled.
verses.hausa: Alhãli idãnunsu na ƙasƙantattu.

verses.english: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?
verses.hausa: Sunã cẽwa "Ashe lalle zã a iya mayar da mu a kan sãwunmu?

verses.english: Even if we should be decayed bones?
verses.hausa: "Ashe, idan muka zama ƙasusuwa rududdugaggu?"

verses.english: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Waccan kam kõmãwa ce, tãɓaɓɓiya!"

verses.english: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
verses.hausa: To, ita kam, tsãwa guda kawai ce.

verses.english: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
verses.hausa: Sai kawai gã su a bãyan ƙasa.

verses.english: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -
verses.hausa: Shin, lãbãrin Mũsã ya zo maka?

verses.arabic: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.english: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da Ubangijinsa Ya kirãye shi, a cikin kwari mai tsarki, wato Duwã?

verses.english: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
verses.hausa: Ka tafi zuwa ga Fir'auna, lalle ne shi, ya ƙẽtare haddi.

verses.arabic: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.english: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself
verses.hausa: "Sai ka ce masa, Kõ zã ka so ka tsarkaka.

verses.english: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
verses.hausa: "Kuma in shiryar da kai zuwa ga Ubangijinka domin ka ji tsoronSa?"

verses.english: And he showed him the greatest sign,
verses.hausa: Sai ya nũna masa ãyar nan mafi girma.

verses.english: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.
verses.hausa: Sai ya ƙaryata, kuma ya sãɓa (umurni),

verses.english: Then he turned his back, striving.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan ya jũya bãya, yanã tafiya da sauri.

verses.english: And he gathered [his people] and called out
verses.hausa: Sai ya yi gayya, sa'an nan ya yi kira.

verses.english: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."
verses.hausa: Sai ya ce: "Nĩ ne Ubangijinku mafi ɗaudaka."

verses.english: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka Allah Ya kama shi, dõmin azãbar maganar ƙarshe da ta farko.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, a cikin wannan haƙiƙa akwai abin kula ga wanda yake tsõron Allah.

verses.arabic: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا
verses.english: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
verses.hausa: Shin, kũ ne mafi wuyar halitta ko sama? Allah Ya gina ta.

verses.english: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.
verses.hausa: Ya ɗaukaka rufinta, sa'an nan Ya daidaita ta.

verses.english: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.
verses.hausa: Kuma Ya duhuntar da darenta, kuma Ya fitar da hantsinta.

verses.english: And after that He spread the earth.
verses.hausa: Kuma, ƙasa a bayan haka Ya mulmula ta.

verses.english: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,
verses.hausa: Ya fitar da ruwanta daga gare ta da makiyãyarta.

verses.english: And the mountains He set firmly
verses.hausa: Da duwatsu, Yã kafe ta.

verses.english: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.
verses.hausa: Domin jiyarwa dãɗi a gare ku, kuma ga dabbõbinku.

verses.english: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
verses.hausa: To, idan uwar masĩfu, mafi girma, ta zo.

verses.english: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,
verses.hausa: Rãnar da mutum zai yi tunãnin abin da ya aikata.

verses.english: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -
verses.hausa: Kuma, a bayyana Jahĩm ga mai gani.

verses.english: So as for he who transgressed
verses.hausa: To, amma wanda ya yi girman kai.

verses.english: And preferred the life of the world,
verses.hausa: Kuma, ya zãɓi rãyuwa ta kusa, (wato dũniya).

verses.english: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
verses.hausa: To, lalle ne Jahĩm, ita ce makõma.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
verses.english: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
verses.hausa: Kuma, amma wanda ya ji tsõron tsayi a gaba ga Ubangijinsa, kuma ya kange kansa daga son rai.

verses.english: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
verses.hausa: To, lalle ne Aljanna ita ce makõma.

verses.english: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
verses.hausa: Sunã tambayar ka game da sa'a, wai yaushe ne matabbatarta?

verses.english: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
verses.hausa: Me ya haɗã ka da ambatonta?

verses.english: To your Lord is its finality.
verses.hausa: Zuwa ga Ubangijinka ƙarshen al'amarinta yake.

verses.english: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
verses.hausa: Kai mai gargaɗi kawai ne ga mai tsõron ta.

verses.arabic: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.english: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
verses.hausa: Kamar sũ a rãnar da zã su gan ta, ba su zauna ba fãce a lõkacin marẽce ko hantsinsa.
